Class Island

java.lang.Object
Island
public class Island extends Object
Represents a polygon-shaped island within the Iceepeecee simulation. An island is defined by its vertices, color, and can have borders drawn around it. This class provides methods to manipulate the visibility of the island and its borders. It also allows retrieval of the island's location and polygon representation.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Juliana Brice√±o & Cristian Alvarez

      public void drawBorder()
